list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Cross-validation string processed cosine-similarity F1-score
starting crossing cross validation data with the TF-IDF matrix - The code seems correct, still the algorithm has to be reconsidered and rethinked, since the F1-score achieved very poor results

option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

task.summary: split data into training, cross-validation and test set. correction of parse function
Parenthesis + Ponctuation + Upper/Down case + Remove stop words + replace + segmentation
Bug fixes and stemm stopword list in order to get better results (we wish)
